content: 4 inch - 9 row of body pattern  5 inch - 12 row of body pattern  6 inch - 14 row of body pattern  8 inch - 17 row of body pattern  10 inch - 22 row of body pattern ©buttonnose crochet for full support please contact me via my facebook page buttonnose crochet 2 base note chain 2 at start of rounds do not count as a stitch row 1 make a magic_ring make 12 double_crochet in ring slip_stitch to first double_crochet chain 2 does not count 12 row 2 2 5 inch bottle base chain 2 2dc in same st 2dc in each st around slip_stitch to first double_crochet 24 row 3 3 inch bottle base chain 2 2 double_crochet in same st *double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st* repeat around slip_stitch to first double_crochet 36 row 4 3 5inch bottle base chain 2 2dc in same st *double_crochet in next 2 st 2dc in next st* repeat around slip_stitch to first double_crochet 48 body note chain 2 at start of row are part of decrease row 1 2 5in base- 8 x clv / 3in base - 12 x clv / 3 5 in base - 16 x clv chain 2 double_crochet chain 1 decrease in same st *skip 2 st clv in next* repeat around slip_stitch to first cluster slip_stitch to chain 1 space row 2 chain 2 double_crochet chain 1 decrease in same st *clv in next chain 1 space skipping 2 clusters* repeat around slip_stitch to top of fist cluster slip_stitch to chain 1 space repeat row 2 until 1cm from the top of the bottle for my daughters 750ml bottle i done 12 row of clusters on the last round do not slip_stitch to chain 1 space ©buttonnose crochet for full support please contact me via my facebook page buttonnose crochet 3 top note chain 1 does not count as a stitch 1 chain 1 single_crochet in top of first cluster *single_crochet in chain 1 space single_crochet in next 2 cluster* repeat around single_crochet in last cluster slip_stitch to first single_crochet 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in each st around slip_stitch to first single_crochet 3 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in each st around slip_stitch to first single_crochet sew in ends strap note numbers in brackets are the total stitches chain 1 does not count as a stitch at beginning of row child chain 101 100 - sew on 2 sides of carrier adult chain 161 160 - sew on 2 sides of carrier wrist chain 51 50 - sew both ends together on 1 side small handle chain 41 40 - sew on 2 sides of carrier lanyard loop chain 19 20 - sew both ends together on 1 side of carrier side handle sew to top of base row and top of carrier height 3 inch - chain 15 14 4 inch - chain 19 18 5 inch - chain
